summary: E-commerce website (Carzzz) for displaying car products with categories and ordering functionality
architectural_notes: Application deployed on Internet Computer blockchain using canisters
Website displays car products organized by categories

existing_features.title: Create a new order page route at '/order/:productId' that displays the selected product's details including image, name, description, and price
Add an order form to the order page with fields for customer name, email, phone number, shipping address (street, city, postal code, country), and quantity selector
Display order summary on the order page showing selected product, quantity, unit price, and calculated total price
Implement form validation for the order form with error messages for invalid or missing required fields
Add a 'Place Order' button that validates the form and shows a success message with order confirmation details
Update the ProductCard component to change the 'Order Now' button to navigate to the order page (/order/:productId) for the specific product
Add navigation link to return to products page from the order page
